comprehensive_overview: The Insight Segmentation and Registration Toolkit (ITK) is an open-source, cross-platform library that provides advanced image processing algorithms for registering and segmenting multidimensional scientific images.
core_features: ITK offers a wide range of tools for image analysis, including image filtering, segmentation, registration, and visualization. It provides support for N-dimensional images and is designed to be extensible, facilitating the integration of new algorithms.
